attributes.action: Show you're "Green" - Get rid of Road Tax and SORN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Road tax used to have a genuine purpose - to show entitlement to use the vehicle on the public road (ie it was insured and MOT'd). 

With the introduction of computerisation and ANPR there is no need for a tax disc now. (except of course as a revenue raiser). 

SORN has no purpose at all. If I want to keep a vehicle off the road, why is it the business of the DVLA? It is only their business if I use a vehicle ON a public road without insurance or MOT.

So PROVE you're green - Abolish road tax and sorn & get rid of all the admin and paper surrounding this. 

Add the lost revenue to fuel (we won't notice it with the amount you screw out of us already!)
